name: yellow-nectar
effect: Changes Oricorio to Pom-Pom Style.  Single-use and cannot be used in battle.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A flower nectar obtained at Melemele Meadow.
It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.
